title: Bulletin of the Section of Taxation, American Bar Association

contents.note: JSTOR (1962-1967; full text also available for subscription or payment)
JSTOR (1947-1962; full text also available for subscription or payment)

additional-note: The 'Bulletin of...' title was formally adopted in 1962.  Before then, the publication title was less formal, and in different places might be 'Section of Taxation Bulletin', 'Tax Section Bulletin', or something similar.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
